Package userData.users

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
userData.users.UserController
@RestController public class UserController extends Object
Controller used for all user action requests

      Parameters:

      password - the id of the user
      Returns:
      json data of user of id
      Throws:
      IOException - if user already exists
